verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There's a course that must be finished

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There's a race that must be run

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There's a mission to accomplish

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And a battle to be won

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: We've been called to take the challenge

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: By God's might and through His Son

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: He will give us grace to complete the race

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Moving forward

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Pressing on

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: Toward the hope of our high calling

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Toward the promise we recieved

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: With the faith that we've been given

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: Pressing on to victory

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: Toward the one who runs before us,

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: As we lay each weight aside

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: Till the race is run

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: Till the price is won

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: Till we reach the finish line

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: Press on

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: There's a faithful clouds of witnesses

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: who inspires us with our task

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: they have fought the fight

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: they have run the race

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: they have won the crown atlast

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: and the lives they live inspire us

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: though the race at time seems long

verse.name: v27
verse.lines: God will give us grace to complete the race

verse.name: v28
verse.lines: moving forward, pressing on
